description:
Leading 3D Modelling Software for Urban Cooling and Climate Adaptive Planning


UX
- ENVI-core: Further reduced simulation times up to 50% compared to 5.8.0 (depending on model area size) through optimized background processes
- BIO-met: Reductions in calculation time through optimized background processes
UI
- Albero: Added possibility to change photosynthesis parameters
- DBManager: Made Albedo of natural soils editable
Bugfixes
- ENVI-core: Albedo of natural soils fixed
- ENVI-core: Fixed a major bug in conservation of energy - this leads to noticeable changes in the results
- ENVI-core: Fixed a rare bug causing large/long simulations with many outputs to crash
- ENVI-guide: Fixed a bug when re-saving existing .SIMX â€“> additional .SIMX extension is not added to the file anymore
Other Changes
- ENVI-core: Changed the heat exchange method between building walls and air to a more accurate approach
